### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/M1_5.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/M1_5_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: M1.5.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Octocorals-suitability-2012** (Yesson et al. 2012).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                     |url                                                                                                                        |
|:---------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Octocorals-suitability-2012 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/40>{target='links'} :: <http://doi.pangaea.de/10.1594/PANGAEA.775081>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:



Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Yesson C, Taylor ML, Tittensor DP, Davies AJ, Guinotte J, Baco A, Black J, Hall-Spencer JM, Rogers AD  (2012) *Global habitat suitability of cold-water Octocorals* **Journal of Biogeography** 39: 1278-1292 [DOI: 10.1111/j.1365-2699.2011.02681.x](http:dx.doi.org/ 10.1111/j.1365-2699.2011.02681.x)
